Name: Shell Side Arm
Effect: Single Target. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Poison the Target. If the User’s Strength score is higher than their Special, this Move becomes Physical, using Brawl for Accuracy and inflicting Damage with Strength.
Description: The Pokémon shoots slime ammunition from their cannon-like arm, or strike the foe directly with the cannon arm. They may find themselves out of ammo, but never out of options.
